name: seal-case
effect: Contains Seals used for decorating Pokéballs.
short_effect: Stores Seals that can be applied to Poké Ball capsules.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the capsule cases of Poké Balls.
flavor_text.platinum: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the capsule cases of Poké Balls.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the Capsule cases of Poké Balls.
